FuncDef:
The connect-server command configures a candidate PCE server for a PCE client and displays the candidate PCE server view.
The undo connect-server command deletes a candidate PCE server.
By default, no candidate PCE server is configured for a PCE client.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the IP address of a candidate PCE server.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
A client sends a request to the server to calculate a path, and the server calculates a path.
Multiple candidate PCE servers can be specified for a PCE client. To specify a candidate PCE server for a PCE client, run the connect-server command.
Follow-up Procedure
Run the preference command to set a priority value for each candidate server.
